title: Advice required
content: I am not really good at dance or theater but I  want to get in those clubs will they take me

comments.body:
Hey, if you are interested then why not!,its not wrong to give something a try.. 

There's no one stopping you from trying. 

Give a shot at everything!

U can go for positions like editor, content head something like that. But give it a try, learn a choreo, go perform it. I enjoyed a lot being in a dance club and I would recommend u too to take part of one or the other clubs.
